ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" SONY Super HAD CCD, color DSP, automatic CDS sensor. Horizontal Resolution: 420 TV Lines
Build-in f 3.6mm lens for wide angle view;0 lux with IR LED
26 built-in long range IR illuminators, IR illuminator effective up to about 50 feet
Water, dust and crush resistant glass coating. Weatherproof housing
Package included: 1 of CCD Camera, 1 of camera power supply, 1 of camera extension cable, 1 of Pre-Amp mini microphone,bonus security warning Decal.
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Outdoor Day Night Vision Built-in 1/3" SONY CCD Security Camera Infrared Weatherproof 420TVL 3.6mm Wide View Angle Lens CCTV camera for DVR Home Surveillance System with Mini Microphone, Power Supply and Video Audio Power Cable 1V4
